com.incoming.pvnsdk

Class PushVideo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.incoming.pvnsdk.PushVideo

  • public class PushVideo
extends Object
    The main class used to configure the Push Video SDK. Add the following to onCreate() method of the host application's Android Application class or launch Activity: 
     
  // Optionally activate SDK logging
  LogIncoming.setDevBuild(true);
  PushVideo.initialize(getApplicationContext(), "API ENDPOINT", "PROJECT KEY");

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static String PREF_KEY_USE_STRICT_MODE 
      static boolean THROW_ON_INVALID_VIDEO
      Throw an exception when the video entity invariant check fails.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                              String endPoint,
                              String projectKey)
        Configure the Push Video SDK.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context. This must not be null.
        endPoint - the PVN API endpoint provided with the PVN configuration. This must not be null.
        projectKey - the project key provided with the PVN configuration. This must not be null.

      • initializeDL

        public static void initializeDL(android.content.Context context,
                                String endPoint,
                                String projectKey)
        Configure the Push Video SDK.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context. This must not be null.
        endPoint - the PVN API endpoint provided with the PVN configuration. This must not be null.
        projectKey - the project key provided with the PVN configuration. This must not be null.

      • configureNotificationActionTypes

        public static void configureNotificationActionTypes(NotificationActionType[] actions)
        Configure the action buttons to display on each notification. No action buttons will be displayed if this method is not called.
        Parameters:
        actions - the actions to display on a notification.

      • configureAdManager

        public static void configureAdManager(PushVideoAdManager adManager)
        Host applications that wish to deliver advertisements should use this method to register an adapter for and advertising SDK. This method must be called after initialize(Context, String, String)
        Parameters:
        adManager - an adapter to an advertising SDK.

      • updateProject

        public void updateProject()
        For internal use. Call after project key is updated via install referrer.

      • reconfigure

        public void reconfigure()
        For internal use.
